loop-desc: Learning Object Online Platform, Extension to create academic learning content
looplegacy-tracking-category-desc: Pages with deprecated tags from older LOOP versions.
loop-permission-error: You do not have enough rights to perform the desired action.
loopstructure-save-parsed-structure-erro: An error occurred during the save process.
loopstructure-save-parse-error: The format of the table of contents is invalid.
loopstructure-save-dublicates-error: At least one page has been added multiple times to the structure.
loopstructure-save-success: The table of contents has been updated successfully.
loopsettings-no-permission: You are not permitted to view this page.
loopsettings-save-success: The changes were updated. Empty your browser's cache to see all changes.
loopsettings-rights-text-placeholder: for example the name of the copyright owner
loopsettings-rights-text-hint: Only alphanumeric and these special characters are permitted:
loopsettings-extra-footer-label: Add an additional footer, for example to add '''sponsors' logos'''
extraFooter: This is the additional footer that has been activated in [[Special:LoopSettings|LOOP Settings]]. You can edit it's contents [[MediaWiki:ExtraFooter|here].
loopsettings-upload-hint: You can enter previously uploaded files or upload new ones here.
loopsettings-customlogo-hint: Please enter a filename, for example Filename.jpg
loopsettings-customlogo-editablestyles: The given logo will only be displayed in these skin styles: $1
loopsettings-error-customlogo-notfound: There is no uploaded file with the given filename for a custom logo. Please check spelling or upload the file first.
loopsettings-url-imprint-privacy-hint: Please enter a full URL, including http:// OR a page title from this LOOP.
loopsettings-url-hint: Please enter a full URL, including http://
loopsettings-error: An error occurred trying to save
loopsettings-numbering-objects-label: Activate numbering of LOOP-objects, e.g. figures
loopsettings-citation-style-vancouver-la: '''Vancouver''', Displayed with superior numbers, e.g. ²
extraSidebar: This is the additional sidebar panel that has been activated in [[Special:LoopSettings|LOOP Settings]]. You can edit it's contents [[MediaWiki:ExtraSidebar|here]].
loopsettings-extra-sidebar-linktext: Edit the additional sidebar panel's content
loopsettings-extra-sidebar-label: Show a custom sidebar panel globally.
loopsettings-bugreport-email-label: User's bug reports will be sent to this email. Leave empty to disable bug reports.
loopsettings-objects-hint: Here you can change the settings of figures, formulas, listings, media, tasks and tables.
loopsettings-export-t2s-label: offer text to speech on pages
loopsettings-export-scorm-label: offer Scorm for download (only for permitted users)
loopsettings-export-xml-label: offer XML for download (only for permitted users)
loopsettings-export-html-label: offer offline version for download (only for permitted users)
loopsettings-captcha-nokeys: Captchas are deactivated as the configuration is not complete.
loopsettings-captcha-desc: Please note that your privacy page needs some extension upon activating captchas.
loopsettings-captcha-usergroup: Only for self-registered users in an open LOOP
loopsettings-captcha-edit-label: ... triggered on every attempted page save
loopsettings-captcha-addurl-label: ... triggered on a page save that would add one or more URLs to the page
loopsettings-captcha-createaccount-label: ... triggered on creation of a new account
loopsettings-captcha-badlogin-label: ... triggered on the next login attempt after a failed one.
loopsettings-captcha-bugreport-label: ... triggered on the bug report page
loopsettings-feedback-level-module: Collect for the LOOP as a whole
loopsettings-rss-text: Copy the link below into your RSS reaser.
loopsettings-rss-unprotected-label: Allow reading the feed without token or login (not recommented)
loopexport-audio-intro-url: You can find the loop online at $1.
loopexport-audio-intro-date: It is at the level of $1
loopexport-pdf-test-success: All pages were loaded successfully! If the PDF still doesn't work, [[Special:PurgeCache|delete the caches]] or contact your administrator.
loopexport-pdf-test-failure: An error occurred on page $1. You can look at the error log at the end of this page.
loopexport-pdf-test-notice: In the tracking category for $1 are pages listed that contain errors. Look at these pages in edit mode to find the sources.
loopexport-pdf-error: An error occurred during the export of PDF.
purgecache-warning: This will purge the cache tables.
specialpage-no-permission: You do not have permission to view this page.
loopliterature-label-overwrite: Overwrite data for this literature key
loopliterature-import-description: You can import literature in BibTeX format here.
loopliterature-import-hint:
Add a literature entry on this page so it can displayed in the bibliography. After that you can refer it in a tag.
You can [[Special:LoopLiteratureImport| import]] multiple entries at once if you have them in BibTeX format.
loopliterature-import-success: These entries have been successfully imported:
loopliterature-import-no-bibtex: No BibTeX entry could be found in the given input.
loopliterature-alert-saved: The literature entry '''$1''' has been saved.
loopliterature-alert-deleted: The literature entry '''$1''' has been deleted.
loopliterature-error-notsaved: The literature entry has '''NOT''' been saved because of errors:
loopliterature-error-missingrequired: The required field '''$1''' has not been entered.
loopliterature-error-unknowntype: The type of entry '''$1''' is unknown.
loopliterature-error-missingkey: No literature key has been entered.
loopliterature-error-keyalreadyexists: The literature key exists already. Please choose a different one or overwrite the data.
loopliterature-error-keyunknown: The literature key '''$1''' does not exist. Please [[Special:LoopLiteratureEdit| create it]].
loopliterature-error-invalid-export: The following literature entries cannot be exported, as the key does not match BibTeX format:
loopliterature-error-dublicate-id: The literature reference '$3' does not have a unique ID ($1). On page '$2' is another reference with that same ID. Please change the ID so the reference can be taken into account in bibliography.
looplegacy-biblio: The tag '''biblio''' is not supported since LOOP2. Please use the new tag '''<loop_literature>'''.
looplegacy-references: The tag '''references''' is obsolete since LOOP2. Footnotes are automatically displayed at the end of the page as soon as there is a <ref> tag in use.
loopobject-error-unknown-id: The object's ID is not in the database ($1). Please check the object's syntax.
loopobject-error-dublicate-id: The object's ID is not unique ($1). On page '$2' is another object with that same ID. Please change the ID and save the pages again so the numbering will be correct.
loopreference-error-unknown-refid: The reference's given ID is unknown: '''$1'''.
loopreference-error-no-refid: The reference is missing a ID parameter (id).
loop-glossary-empty: The glossary is still empty. Add an entry by creating a page like ''[[Glossary:Term]]''.
loopglossary-alert-saved: The glossary page [[Glossary:$1|$1]] was saved! You can edit the page now.
loopindex-error-dublicate-id: The indexed term '$3' does not have a unique ID ($1). On page '$2' is another term with that same ID. Please change the ID so the term can be properly indexed.
loopsidebar-error-notfound: The given page for the sidebar panel does not exist.
loopsidebar-error-nopage: The sidebar-tag is missing a page parameter.
loopzip-error-nostartfile: The given HTML file $1 (parameter start) was not found in the ZIP file $2.
loop-error-missingrequired: The tag $1 is missing the required parameter $2. The element can not be displayed.
loop-error-missingfile: The given file $2 in this $1 tag could not be found. Please upload it first. {{PLURAL:$3|The element is displayed without that file.|The element can not be displayed.}}
loop-error-unknown-param:
The tag $1 contains a parameter $2 with an unknown value '''$3'''.
Valid values are '''$4'''. The element is rendered by default with value $5.
loopterminology-warning-deleted: All entries have been removed from the list of abbreviations.
loopterminology-save-success: The abbreviations have been updated successfully.
loopterminology-hint: You can edit the list of abbreviations here. For information about formatting see below the textfield.
loopterminology-example:
Use a semicolon in front of the abbreviation to define it. In an new row use a colon as the first character and describe the previously defined term. You can use multiple terms for multiple definitions. Example:
;LOOP
;L.O.O.P.
:Learning Object Online Platform
loopbugreport-email:
In LOOP [$1 $1] a bug has been reported. Your email address has been added to this LOOP's settings for bug reports. Sender address: $2
Page of bug: [$3 $3]
Description:
$4
loopbugreport-error-configuration: This function has not been configured yet.
loopbugreport-error-nodata: This page must be opened from a link in the content area.
loopbugreport-error-nocaptcha: Please solve the captcha to ensure you were filling in this form.
loopbugreport-fail: The message could not be sent.
loopbugreport-desc:
Did you find a bug?
Please tell us and add your e-mail address for further questions.
Thank you for your help!
loopfeedback-rating-descr-module: How satisfied were you generally with these contents?
loopfeedback-rating-descr-chapter: How satisfied were you with the contents of this chapter?
loopfeedback-specialpage-feedback-for-ch: Feedback for the contents of this chapter
loopfeedback-specialpage-feedback-for-mo: Feedback for the contents of this LOOP
loopfeedback-specialpage-rating-descr: How satisfied were you with these contents?
loopfeedback-specialpage-confirm-reset-p: Do you really want to reset feedback of "$1"?
loopfeedback-specialpage-confirm-reset-a: Do you really want to reset all feedbacks?
loopfeedback-specialpage-inactive: No feedback is collected at this point.
loopfeedback-specialpage-reset-info: * Resetting feedbacks should only be done after making some general changes to the contents.
loopfeedback-already-done: You already gave us feedback. Thank you!
loopconsent-text: When you load this media, content is loaded by the service providers and your IP address is transfered to them.
loopngspice-error-xml:
Ngspice is not configured correctly.
XML Elements can't be loaded.
loopngspice-error-min-value: The minimum value for $1 was not met (min = $2)
loopngspice-error-max-value: The maximum value for $1 was not met  (max = $2)
looppagesnotinstructure: Pages not in table of contents
loopupdater-description-update: Executes CLI command /maintenance/update.php. WARNING: Only to be used by administrators. In case of errors this LOOP might cease to function.
loopupdater-warning-update: I confirm that backups of the database and files of this LOOP have been made.
